mainText:
“Steve leaves behind a company that only he could have built, and his spirit will forever be the foundation of Apple.”

I’ll go a step further and say that his spirit will forever be the foundation of many technologies and companies that exist today, exclusive of Apple.  Many of the products developed by competitors that we use today are as good as the are only because of the foresight and vision had by Steve.  We’ll miss Steve and all he did for our world.
author: Michael
